extendedInfo.description: This is the OFFICIAL application of NC State Sports created by the CBSSports.com College Network, in partnership with the University. This exclusive sports application offers LIVE STREAMED games:************************************************************LIVE VIDEO* & AUDIO*- Upgrade in the application to stream select games************************************************************* Audio and video are only available on certain compatible Android devices running OS2.2 or later. This device has not been tested for video compatibility. In order to access the audio or video please install the Sports Media Player in Google Play and re-launch this application.Annual Subscription $9.99ADDITIONAL APPLICATION FEATURES-	Live Scoring-	Play-by-Play-	Complete Sport Schedules-	Exclusive breaking sports news-	Video on demand-	Alerts (game start and final scores)-	Team and Coaches Rosters & Bios-	 Much moreâ¦COVERS ALL SCHOOL SPORTS!

reviews.title: Used to be good
reviews.comment: This app used to let you listen to games live. What the crap happened to that? Now I always get the error about in-app billing. What a waste of $9.99. If I could give it 0 stars, I would.
reviews.author: Brent Curtis

reviews.title: Good app. Go Pack!
reviews.comment: The update did wonders for this app. The new app allows me to move it to the SD card, and doesn\'t constantly run in the background. Those were my two biggest complaints. The updated version looks great. It force closes pretty often... enough to be annoying. Navigation is OK, but could be improved. I like the Twitter feed integration. Until the force closing problems get worked out it gets 3 stars from me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Concept is good but the streaming video does not work.  Wasted $9.99. I hear the iphone app does work. Please fix the streaming video.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredibly Frustrating
reviews.comment: Let me start at the beginning... took me 45 minutes to find it because it\'s not linked to obvious key words like nc state, state, ncsu, wolfpack, cbs sports, and college network.  Next, it won\'t play video on my motorola RAZR.  After I\'ve unsuccessfully tried to watch a video from this app, the articles no longer appear, and eventually the app locks up.
reviews.author: A Google User
